snippet.title: OveRRooT_Trailer_SteamNextFest
snippet.description:
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2557480/OveRRooT/

Join us in the Steam Next Fest and play a new demo of OveRRooT, an Action Platformer focused on challenging and fast paced combat!

You control Root, a sophisticated malware created with a sole objective: bypass the defenses of malfunctioning computer systems, reset them to their default state and bring them back to life again!

Now it's time for you to take on a new job, in a new system. Erase anything on your path, fulfill your instructions, uncover hidden secrets. Find the truth if you can.

Nothing more than just the same old routine... probably.
